TopicTitle: The Mjolnir V - 100% Stock Apollo Recreation

Articles.Content:
The Mjolnir V is my attempt at a Saturn V replica. Its fairly accurate in performance and fuel ratios, and somewhat in the looks department. The craft blew up on Reddit, much to my surprise so I wanted to make it public. I enjoyed working on it and hope you all enjoy. The Craft and the action group list is available on Kerbal X here see Mjolnir V on KerbalX.com

Mjolnir V - KSP Saturn V remake
 
Edited July 15, 2017 by HappilyStreet
